text: Richard FerrybridgeRichard Feribrigge, Ferribrigge, Ferrybrigge, Ferabrich, Ferebrich, Ferebrigge, Ferebrigus, Ferabricius etc. was an English Scholastic logician of the fourteenth century. His works include a Tractatus de veritate sive logica, and the Consequentiae.Printed 1493 in Venice as Ricardus de Ferabrich; page (PDF). He is alluded to in The Anatomy of Melancholy.As Ferribrigge, . ==References== * ==Notes== Category:English logicians Category:14th-century English people Category:English philosophers
title: Richard Ferrybridge
